heisig_chinese_memo: You arrive at the pinnacle after a long trip down the road and the guards want to do a body search.  They try to use a body scanner which goes right to left scanning the whole body but the technology seems unsafe so I opt for the manual searching.  The guards says "As you wish..." and I start stripping down.
Ru_trainchinese: suí: (глаг/предлог) следовать; соответствовать; разрешать действовать по желанию; (разг.) походить на, выглядеть как; вместе с
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pinnacle signifies your personal goal and destination. What you're seeking to possess lies at the end of the yellow-brick road. You must follow the road to do as you wish.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", " 𡐦 " to save the sound, the original meaning is to follow. "Said Wen": "Cong Ye. Cong Zou, 𡐦 save the sound." "Lao Tzu": "The sound and sound are in harmony, followed by one another."

" Follow " can mean to follow. "Shu‧Yugong": "Yu covered the soil and published wood with the mountain." Sun Xingyan: ""Huainan‧ Xiuwuxun": "Publish the wood with the mountain." Gao Luu's Note: "Follow, follow also." Xunyi Approaching."

" Following " also means chasing and pursuing. "Yi‧ Sui": "Six three: Be a husband, lose a kid, ask for whatever you want, get it." Gao Heng's note: "Follow, chase."

" Sui " also means letting go and letting go. "Han Feizi·Yu Lao": "The husband and the thing have constant capacity, because they are multiplied and guided, and because of the capacity of the thing." Wang Xianshen gathered and explained: "Things have a fixed shape, take advantage of the opportunity to guide them, don't need to carve, but listen to it naturally. Take shape."

" Following " also means immediately, right away. "Mo Zi‧ Zashou": "Those who keep the beacon are in a hurry, wait for more than fifty people, and if you take them to the leaves, they will go." Sun Yi asked Xian to quote Wang Yinzhi and said: "There are no more than fifty people when you speak. When you get to the battlefield, you can go there."

" Sui " is also one of the sixty-four hexagrams, "Yi‧ Sui": "Sui: Yuanheng, Lizhen, Wugui." Gao Heng's note: "Jingyi: "Sui", the name of the hexagram."
humanum_short_description_en: from "辵", " 𡐦 " to save the sound, the original meaning is to follow.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「𡐦」省聲，本義為跟從。《說文》：「从也。从辵，𡐦省聲。」《老子》：「音聲相和，前後相隨。」

　　「隨」可表示順著。《書‧禹貢》：「禹敷土，隨山刊木。」孫星衍疏：「《淮南‧脩務訓》：『隨山刊木。』高誘注：『隨，循也。』循義近行。」

　　「隨」也表示追逐、追求。《易‧隨》：「六三：係丈夫，失小子，隨有求，得。」高亨注：「隨，追逐。」

　　「隨」亦表示聽任、任憑。《韓非子‧喻老》：「夫物有常容，因乘以導之，因隨物之容。」王先慎集解：「物有定形，乘其機以引導之，不待雕琢，而聽其自然以成形。」

　　「隨」還表示隨即，馬上。《墨子‧雜守》：「守烽者事急，候無過五十，寇至葉，隨去之。」孫詒讓閒詁引王引之曰：「言候無過五十人，及寇至堞時，即去之也。」

　　「隨」同時是六十四卦之一，《易‧隨》：「隨：元亨，利貞，無咎。」高亨注：「經意：《隨》，卦名。」

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: To walk 遀 to the city 阝; to follow a path
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 遀 [ suí ] to walk
①跟着：隨從。隨員。隨葬。隨即(立刻)。隨行(xíng)。隨身。隨喜。隨波逐流。隨行(háng)就市。
②順從，任憑：隨意。隨口。隨宜。隨和。隨俗。隨筆。隨遇而安。
③順便，就着：隨帶。隨手關門。
④像：他長得隨他父親。
⑤姓氏。

Chinese: You arrive at the pinnacle after a long trip down the road and the guards want to do a body search. They try to use a body scanner which goes right to left scanning the whole body but the technology seems unsafe so I opt for the manual searching. The guards says "As you wish..." and I start stripping down.
Meaning: as you wish

Story: The pinnacle signifies your personal goal and destination. What you're seeking to possess lies at the end of the yellow-brick road. You must follow the road to do as you wish.
Kind: traditional

從「 辵 」，「 𡐦 」省聲，本義為跟從。《說文》：「从也。从辵，𡐦省聲。」《老子》：「音聲相和，前後相隨。」 「 隨 」可表示順著。《書‧禹貢》：「禹敷土，隨山刊木。」孫星衍疏：「《淮南‧脩務訓》：『隨山刊木。』高誘注：『隨，循也。』循義近行。」 「 隨 」也表示追逐、追求。《易‧隨》：「六三：係丈夫，失小子，隨有求，得。」高亨注：「隨，追逐。」 「 隨 」亦表示聽任、任憑。《韓非子‧喻老》：「夫物有常容，因乘以導之，因隨物之容。」王先慎集解：「物有定形，乘其機以引導之，不待雕琢，而聽其自然以成形。」 「 隨 」還表示隨即，馬上。《墨子‧雜守》：「守烽者事急，候無過五十，寇至葉，隨去之。」孫詒讓閒詁引王引之曰：「言候無過五十人，及寇至堞時，即去之也。」 「 隨 」同時是六十四卦之一，《易‧隨》：「隨：元亨，利貞，無咎。」高亨注：「經意：《隨》，卦名。」
From " 辵", " 𡐦" to save the sound, the original meaning is to follow. "Said Wen": "Cong Ye. Cong Zou, 𡐦 save the sound." "Lao Tzu": "The sound and sound are in harmony, followed by one another." " Follow" can mean to follow. "Shu‧Yugong": "Yu covered the soil and published wood with the mountain." Sun Xingyan: ""Huainan‧ Xiuwuxun": "Publish the wood with the mountain." Gao Luu's Note: "Follow, follow also." Xunyi Approaching." " Following" also means chasing and pursuing. "Yi‧ Sui": "Six three: Be a husband, lose a kid, ask for whatever you want, get it." Gao Heng's note: "Follow, chase." " Sui" also means letting go and letting go. "Han Feizi·Yu Lao": "The husband and the thing have constant capacity, because they are multiplied and guided, and because of the capacity of the thing." Wang Xianshen gathered and explained: "Things have a fixed shape, take advantage of the opportunity to guide them, don't need to carve, but listen to it naturally. Take shape." " Following" also means immediately, right away. "Mo Zi‧ Zashou": "Those who keep the beacon are in a hurry, wait for more than fifty people, and if you take them to the leaves, they will go." Sun Yi asked Xian to quote Wang Yinzhi and said: "There are no more than fifty people when you speak. When you get to the battlefield, you can go there." " Sui" is also one of the sixty-four hexagrams, "Yi‧ Sui": "Sui: Yuanheng, Lizhen, Wugui." Gao Heng's note: "Jingyi: "Sui", the name of the hexagram."

隨字的基本解释

隨
suí
见“随”。

隨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suí］
［《廣韻》旬爲切，平支，邪。］
“随1”的繁体字。亦作“遀1”。“遺3”的被通假字。亦作“1”。
(1)跟从；追从。
(2)指跟从的人，随侍的人。
(3)追逐；追求。
(4)沿着；顺着。
(5)附和；依从。
(6)听任；任凭。
(7)听使唤。
(8)随即，马上。
(9)依据；按照。
(10)方言。相似；像。
(11)足趾。
(12)卦名。《易》六十四卦之一，震下兑上。
(13)周封国名。
(14)古地名。
(15)姓。汉代有随何。见《史记·高祖本纪》。
[②]［duò］
通“惰1”。“随2”的繁体字。亦作“2”。
[③]［tuǒ］
通“橢1”。“随3”的繁体字。
椭圆貌。

隨字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隨； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1361第04
〔古文〕?遀追【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?旬爲切，音隋。【廣韻】從也，順也。【書·禹貢】隨山刊木。【易·?象】隨風巽，君子以申命行事。【詩·大雅】無縱詭隨。【傳】詭，人之善。隨，人之惡者。　又易卦名。　又【易·咸卦】咸其股，執其隨往吝。【註】隨，謂趾也。【疏】腓動，則足隨之，故謂足爲隨。又【艮卦】艮其腓，不拯其隨。　又【儀禮·鄕射禮】其閒容弓，距隨長武。【註】距隨者，物橫畫也。始前足至東頭爲距，後足來合而南面爲隨。　又地名。【左傳·隱五年】翼侯奔隨。【註】隨，晉地。　又國名。漢爲縣。【左傳·桓六年】楚武王侵隨。【註】隨國，今義陽隨縣。【前漢·地理志】南陽郡隨縣。【註】故厲國也。【韻會】晉置隨郡，齊攺爲州。【正韻】亦作隋。詳前隋字註。　又西隨，縣名。【前漢·地理志】牂牁郡西隨縣。　又沙隨，地名。【春秋·成十六年】會于沙隨。【註】宋地，梁國寧陵縣北有沙隨亭。　又姓。【風俗通】隨侯之後，漢有博士隨何。【史記·匈奴傳】有詔捕太醫令隨但。【前漢·藝文志】隨

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suí］
["Guangyun" is cut in ten days, flat branch, evil. ]
Traditional characters for "随1". Also known as "Loop 1". "Yu 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "1".
(1) Follow; follow.
(2) Refers to the follower, the attendant.
(3) Chase; pursue.
(4) Along; follow.
(5) To agree; to comply.
(6) Let alone; let alone.
(7) At the behest.
(8) Immediately, immediately.
(9) Basis; in accordance with.
(10) Dialects. Similar; like.
(11) Toes.
(12) The hexagram name. One of the sixty-four hexagrams in the Book of Changes.
(13) Zhou Feng's country name.
(14) Ancient place names.
(15) Last name. Whatever happened in the Han Dynasty. See "Historical Records of Gaozu Benji".
[②]［duò］
Pass "Idle 1". Traditional characters for "随2". Also known as "2".
[③] [tuǒ]
Pass "Ellipse 1". Traditional characters for "随3".
Oval appearance.
